@dev Constructor. Links with Marketplace contract
@param marketplaceContract Address of Marketplace contract to link

@dev Checks if msg.sender is the owner of a specific storefront
@param id Storefront id for which to check if msg.sender is the owner
nodes.name: onlyStorefrontOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the entire balance held by the contract.
@return Balance held by the contract
nodes.name: getBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the number of storefronts (including deleted ones)
@return The number of storefronts that were created.
nodes.name: getTotalStorefrontsCount
createStorefront
removeStorefront

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers the balance of a storefront to its owner
@param storefrontId ID of storefront from which to withdraw balance
nodes.name: withdrawStorefrontBalance
getStorefrontCount
getStorefrontId
getStorefrontOwner
getStorefrontsId
getStorefrontName
getStorefrontBalance
addProduct
updateProductPrice
getProductPrice
getProductName
getProduct
removeProduct
getProductCount
getProductId

addProduct(bytes32,string,string,uint256.details: Adds a product to a storefront

params.name: Name of Product
params.storefrontId: ID of storefront to add the product to

params.marketplaceContract: Address of Marketplace contract to link

createStorefront(string).details: Creates a new storefront. Uses msg.sender, the storefront name and `now` to generate storefront id.

getBalance().details: Returns the entire balance held by the contract.

getProduct(bytes32).details: Returns all information about a product

params.productId: ID of product for which to return information

getProduct(bytes32).return: name Name of Productdesc Description of Productprice Price of Productqty Quantity of ProductstorefrontId ID of storefront associated with Product

getProductCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of products (including removed ones) associated to a specific storefront.

params.storefrontId: Storefront ID for which to return the number of products

getProductCount(bytes32).return: The number of products associated to this storefront (including removed ones)

getProductId(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns the ID of an storefront's product at a specific index

params.productIndex: Index in storefront's products for which to return the ID
params.storefrontId: ID of the storefront from which to return a product

getProductId(bytes32,uint256).return: productId ID of product at specified index in storefront's products

getProductName(bytes32).details: Returns the name of a product

params.productId: ID for which to return the name

getProductPrice(bytes32).details: Returns the price of a product

params.productId: ID for which to return the price

getStorefrontBalance(bytes32).details: Returns the balance of a storefront

params.storefrontId: ID for which to return the name

getStorefrontCount(address).details: Returns the number of storefronts (including removed ones) associated to a specific owner.

params.owner: Address for which to return the number of owned storefronts

getStorefrontCount(address).return: The number of storefronts associated to this address (including removed ones)

getStorefrontId(uint256).details: Returns the ID of a storefront at a specific index

params.storefrontIndex: Index in storefronts for which to return the ID

getStorefrontId(uint256).return: storefrontId ID of storefront at specified index

getStorefrontName(bytes32).details: Returns the name of a storefront

params.storefrontId: ID for which to return the name

getStorefrontOwner(bytes32).details: Returns the address of a storefront's owner

params.storefrontId: ID for which to return the owner

getStorefrontOwner(bytes32).return: address Address of the owner of the storefront

getStorefrontsId(address,uint256).details: Returns the ID of an owner's storefront at a specific index

params.storefrontIndex: Index in owner's storefronts for which to return the ID

getStorefrontsId(address,uint256).return: storefrontId ID of storefront at specified index in owner's storefronts

getTotalStorefrontsCount().details: Returns the number of storefronts (including deleted ones)
getTotalStorefrontsCount().return: The number of storefronts that were created.

purchaseProduct(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: Handles the purchase of a product

params.storefrontId: ID of storefront from which to purchase product

purchaseProduct(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).return: True if purchase was executed successfully.

params.storefrontId: Storefront ID for product to remove

removeStorefront(bytes32).details: Removes a storefront. First removes all its products, then removes it from mapping and arrays and finally, sends balance to owner.

updateProductPrice(bytes32,bytes32,uint2.details: Updates the price of a product

params.newPrice: new price to set to product
params.productId: ID of product for which to update price
params.storefrontId: ID of storefront associated with product

withdrawStorefrontBalance(bytes32).details: Transfers the balance of a storefront to its owner

params.storefrontId: ID of storefront from which to withdraw balance

close().notice: Transfers the current balance to the owner and kills the contract.

pause().notice: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.   newOwner Is the address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().notice: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
